summary: Isabella is 30 and single. Her friends have fancy careers, getting married and so on. She is a freelance actor. In her CV, among other merits, she claims being an acrobat. One little lie will leads to another. Bigger.
cast: Martina Haag|Nikolaj Coster-Waldau|Ellen Jelinek|Reine Brynolfsson|Katrin Sundberg|Per Sandberg|Jan Mybrand|Chatarina Larsson|Stig Engström|Ingrid Luterkort|Jonas Malmsjö|Santo Magonza|Richard Ulfsäter|Harald Lönnbro|Kjell Sundvall|Mikael Persbrandt|Hanna Ekman|Daniella Dahmén|Björn Kjellman|Daniel Bingert|Chris Torch|Jannike Grut|Peter Bergared|Nadja Klefelt|Marie Richardson|Markus Celikal|Thomas Hanzon|Åslög Rosén|Lucia Haag|Jackson Haag|Dino Haag|Richard Lane|Jenny Östergren|Anders Kraft|Jesper Lindström|Malte Hallberg|Sonja Holm|Hannu Kiviaho|Kari Hamfors Wernolf|Bengt Krantz|Lotta Westberg|Ulric von der Esch|Roswitha Szyszkowitz|Thomas Sigwald|Max Gruber Bergman|Marcus Ovnell
title: Underbar och älskad av alla (och på jobbet går det också bra)
